tileset = "cave5";
area = "pcave3";
areaname = "Tainted Grotto - B2";
ambience = null;
dungeon = "TaintedGrotto";
A_sprites = [{name:"TRANSPORT_TRIGGER",model:"_trigger",x:33,y:24,triggers:-1,WALKON:true,ExecuteScript:function()
{
   if(!HASPLOTITEM("Talisman of ONEIROS"))
   {
      return undefined;
   }
   _root.WarpTrans(["pcave3_d",33,24]);
}},{name:"Dream Circle",model:"object",type:"examine",x:33,y:24,walkable:true,conv:[["","It\'s a Dream Circle."]]},{name:"Save Crystal",model:"o_Crystal",x:13,y:41,walkspeed:-1,conv:"c_healingCrystal"},{name:"UP",model:"area_transition",x:52,y:49,dest:["pcave2",25,2],dir:"s"},{name:"DOWN",model:"area_transition",x:42,y:1,dest:["pcave4",2,13],dir:"s"}];
areaLoot = [{x:12,y:45,amount:1,item:"Trilobite Key I",type:"plot",hidden:true},{x:42,y:58,amount:1,item:"RingOfSPR+2"},{x:51,y:15,amount:5,item:"Coagulant"},{x:35,y:7,amount:443,type:"gold"},{x:18,y:23,amount:1,item:"Hempen Robe"},{x:2,y:30,amount:1,item:"Steel Greatsword"},{x:2,y:50,amount:1,item:"PhoenixDown"},{x:10,y:58,amount:6,item:"BalloonJuice"}];
if(GameData.plotVars.SAVIOURS == null && GameData.CHAPTER == 2)
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Bartholio",model:"bartholio",x:10,y:23,walkspeed:-2,dir:"s",elem:"LIGHT",conv:"c_Saviours"});
   A_sprites.push({name:"Vennie",model:"vennie",x:10,y:22,walkspeed:-2,dir:"s",elem:"AIR",conv:[["","AAAAAAAAAA"]]});
   A_sprites.push({name:"Aalia",model:"aalia",x:10,y:21,walkspeed:-2,dir:"s",elem:"LIGHT",conv:[["","AAAAAAAAAA"]]});
   A_sprites.push({name:"Bernard",model:"bernard",x:10,y:20,walkspeed:-2,dir:"s",elem:"DARK",conv:[["","AAAAAAAAAA"]]});
   A_sprites.push({name:"WALK_TRIGGER",model:"_trigger",x:10,y:30,ExecuteScript:function()
   {
      _root.playMusic("Saviours");
      _root.freeze = true;
      TempVars.CUTSCENE = true;
      DO_ACTIONS([["WALK",0,-3]],"PC",true);
      DO_ACTIONS([["WALK",0,3],["UNFREEZE"],["TALK","c_Saviours","Bartholio"]],"Bartholio",true);
      DO_ACTIONS([["WALK",0,3]],"Vennie",true);
      DO_ACTIONS([["WALK",0,3]],"Aalia",true);
      DO_ACTIONS([["WALK",0,3]],"Bernard",true);
   }});
}
foes = MONSTER_TABLES.TAINTED_GROTTO;
btlChance = 3;
minSteps = 5;
levelrange = MONSTER_LEVELS.TAINTED_GROTTO;
musicTrack = "Dungeon1";
AreaSetup({WARP:1});
